initialsync.label: Test API Credentials
initialsync.comment: *Please save your settings before clicking here! Use this button to test the account.

sync_customer_schedule.label: Customer Data and Subscribers Sync Schedule

frequency.label: Frequency
frequency.comment: Note: For Weekly and Monthly frequency, the day of the week/month will be today

force_sync.comment: Use this button force the data synchronization to run now

frequency.label: Frequency
frequency.comment: Note: For Weekly and Monthly frequency, the day of the week/month will be today

force_sync.comment: Use this button force the suppressed data synchronization to run now

customer_id.label: Customer ID
customer_id.comment: Please map the customer id, if you want to use the dynamic content.

active.label: Consider Order complete for lost baskets

email.label: Test Email
email.comment: Enter the email for customer to test lost basket, with the first lost basket campaign.

force_test.comment: Use this button force the data synchronization to run now

passcode.label: Passcode
passcode.comment: Recommended: Set a passcode so that basket contents and coupon codes can only be viewed if the following passcode is sent with the request.

memory_limit.label: Memory Limit
memory_limit.comment: Set to NO to use system default memory.

batch_size.label: Customer Sync Batch Size
batch_size.comment: Set the limit size for customers loaded in memory.

debug.label: Debug Mode
debug.comment: Set to YES to allow creating log files
